categories: Category:Songs by The Emperor's New Clothes

nodes.text: "Supremacy" was a song by The Emperor's New Clothes, a pro-Imperial minga musical group. The song appeared on the compilation album Totally Patriotic, which was available by the time between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY. Generally viewed as being written in bad taste, "Supremacy" was nonetheless approved by the Imperial Board of Culture.

"Supremacy" was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a 1993 supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The guide was written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann.
